episodes.title: Do All Spiritual Communities Become Cults?
episodes.description:
Want to know the dark side of spiritual communities?

I jump into the intricacies of spiritual communities, questioning if they often cross the line into becoming cults. 

Drawing from personal experiences within a spiritual community called EnlightenNext for over a decade, I explore the significance of the Triple Gem of Buddhism—the teacher, the dharma, and the community—and discuss the essential role of communal support in spiritual growth. 

The video also examines the darker side of such collectives, touching on issues like hierarchy, groupthink, and the challenges of leaving these communities. Tune in to hear about the real challenges and rewards of being part of a spiritual group.
